data.system_settings: Windows 10 Pro x64 v1803 Firefox Nightly v63.0a1
data.actual_result: The animation freezes and does not complete.
data.short_description: [Website Bug] The exclamation mark animation on the staff page freezes if you move your cursor away from the staff member.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to the Discord staff page - Scroll down to "Meet the Squad" - Hover you mouse over a staff member and remove it until you get the red exclamation mark. - Remove your cursor.
